response.original_title: Revealing the Essence in a Portrait
response.overview: An experimental investigation of the vagina as an individual living organism. Throughout art history, the female body has been depicted as a passive figure and object. Itâ€™s time to understand it as active, with a voice, capable of actions. The work investigates from a neutral perspective, leaving space for an independent creature with a strong voice. It does not need to be put in relation to an action or an object to exist. It takes its own breaths.
response.title: Revealing the Essence in a Portrait
